subtitleNullable: The UTKFace dataset is a comprehensive face dataset. Faces, lots of faces
descriptionNullable:
The UTKFace dataset is a comprehensive face dataset spanning a wide age range (from 0 to 116 years old). It comprises over 20,000 face images with detailed annotations, including age, gender, and ethnicity. The images exhibit a diverse range of poses, facial expressions, lighting conditions, occlusions, and resolutions. This dataset can be used for a variety of tasks, such as face detection, age estimation, and more. The annotations are from [mivolo ](https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.04616). I do not own any of these images or annotations. I only share here for ease of use. Please refer to the website for the licence to use these images or annotations. 

 https://susanqq.github.io/UTKFace/

@inproceedings{zhifei2017cvpr,
  title={Age Progression/Regression by Conditional Adversarial Autoencoder},
  author={Zhang, Zhifei, Song, Yang, and Qi, Hairong},
  booktitle={IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR)},
  year={2017},
  organization={IEEE}
}

https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.04616

https://github.com/WildChlamydia/MiVOLO

@article{mivolo2023,
   Author = {Maksim Kuprashevich and Irina Tolstykh},
   Title = {MiVOLO: Multi-input Transformer for Age and Gender Estimation},
   Year = {2023},
   Eprint = {arXiv:2307.04616},
}
